length_short.description: Password length should be at least 8 characters.

length_moderate.description: Password length should be at least 8 characters.

no_uppercase.description: Password should contain at least one uppercase letter.

no_lowercase.description: Password should contain at least one lowercase letter.

no_number.description: Password should contain at least one number.

no_special_characters.description: Password should contain at least one special character.
